caller_intent: The caller followed up on an email exchange regarding insurance-related documents, confirmed receipt of the email, and requested a quote to be sent for review with a follow-up meeting scheduled for Monday.
resolution_steps: Agent (Serena) acknowledges receipt of the email with updated information and answers to questions.
Informs caller they will prepare and send a quote within a few hours.
Suggests the caller review the quote and confirms a follow-up meeting on Monday morning.
knowledge_required: Email communication protocols for client follow-ups
summary: The caller confirmed receipt of an email containing insurance-related updates and requested a quote. The agent assured the caller a quote would be sent shortly and arranged a follow-up meeting for Monday. The conversation concluded with mutual thanks and a plan for further action.
